section.p: At this height, everything looks huge - including the stag beetles. To you, they have become hideous giant insects, the size of your arm! And to them, you have become a viable meal. The ancient Shadar builders of this pyramid certainly knew how to deal with tomb-robbers.

The structure’s very age, however, may have saved you. You spot a hole in the wall where some of the masonry has fallen away. It is just big enough for you to crawl through. You make a run for it as the beetles close in.
